text: Edward Jonathan "Eddie" Izzard (born 7 February 1962) is an English actor and stand-up comedian. She has acted in movies and television. She is known for her strange comedy and for being a transvestite (she often wore women's clothes). ==Personal life== Izzard has described herself as "a lesbian trapped in a man's body". == Other websites == *Izzard's website * ==References== Category:British stand-up comedians Category:British television producers Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:English comedians Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT comedians Category:English LGBT people Category:1962 births Category:Living people
title: Eddie Izzard
